title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; chat, generate, embed using Ollama’s REST API.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package exposing Ollama models as standard LangChain LLMs & embedders.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Open-source ChatGPT-style web UI for any Ollama model; runs entirely in browser via the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; interact with local LLMs from JVM applications.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama; simple interface to chat and generate completions.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Feature-rich terminal UI (TUI) for Ollama with conversation history, syntax highlighting and plugins.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-style inline suggestions.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes: function-calling, structured output, vision models, fine-tuning, Docker Compose stacks.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that lets servers chat with any local Ollama model via slash commands.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support and autoscaling.

title: ollama-nvidia-docker
summary: Official container images with CUDA runtime for GPU-accelerated inference on NVIDIA cards.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Unofficial but idiomatic Rust crate wrapping Ollama’s REST API with async/await and strong typing.

title: ollama-go
summary: Official Go client library generated from OpenAPI spec; chat, generate, pull, delete models.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack Bolt app that adds /ollama slash command to query local models with optional thread follow-ups.

title: ollama-dagger-module
summary: Dagger module to spin up Ollama services in CI pipelines for testing LLM-powered features.

title: ollama-model-registry
summary: Community-curated JSON registry of custom GGUF models ready to pull into Ollama with one command.

title: ollama-rag-chatbot
summary: Streamlit app demonstrating RAG using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector store for PDF Q&A.
